"Snap N Search"\ is not an accessibility tool. Since users may not reasonably expect that their personal and sensitive user data will be required to provide or improve the policy-compliant features or functionality within this app, a prominent disclosure of the usage of the Accessibility Services API by this app and a declaration of the data collection and data sharing within this app is required. This app requires access to the Accessibility Services API in order to take a screenshot when the app is not in use. Access to the Accessibility Services API will allow this app to record the screen. Screen recordings will be used to create screenshot images. Data is neither collected nor shared by this app using the accessibility capabilities.

If the accessibility settings are grayed out, you will need to allow the \"restricted settings\" first. The \"restricted settings\" can be found in the \"App info\" . Press the 3 dots at top right corner and then allow restricted settings. If you don\'t find the 3 dots at first, navigate through: \nSettings -> Applications -> Snap N Search -> 3 dots -> Allow Restricted Settings

Enable the Snap Button through quick settings or an in-app option, and move it around the screen by long-pressing and dragging. Tap the button to take a screenshot, which automatically launches Google Lens for instant results.

If you set this app as your assist app, you can long press the home button to take a screenshot and launch Google Lens. Enabling this app as your assist app will disable other assistants. You can change the action of the long home button press in the app settings.

Snap N Search is a free, open-source Android app that simplifies screenshot capture and visual search using Google Lens. With its user-friendly interface and minimal permissions, it provides a streamlined experience for quickly accessing visual information.
• Easy screenshot capture with a floating button (Android 9+) or home button long-press (Android 12+).
• Automatic launch of Google Lens for visual searches, object identification, and text translation.
• No storage permissions are needed, ensuring your data remains secure.
Whether you\'re curious about a product or want to translate text from an image, Snap N Search makes it easy. Start exploring with just a snap.
Note: Google Lens must be installed and enabled for Snap N Search to function properly.
